project_descr: Policy and Programme Development for Accelerating pro-poor urbanization (PPDU)

outputs.output_descr: Policy and Programme Development for Accelerating pro-poor Urbanization (PPDU) Initiation Plan (IP) is three-fold. Firstly, it will continue UNDP’s promotion of an enabled urban policy environment. Secondly, the IP will help to further strengthen UNDP’s urban portfolio by launching of the new urban programme, National Urban Poverty Reduction Programme (NUPRP). Thirdly, this will support post-UPPR activities until finalisation of NUPRP.
